ygData.subject: Re: VE vs Lifetap? and more on pet wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Well put Beld. I think we should all realize that SK s are not meant to be healers like paladins and rangers to some extent. We are the hybrid that focuses on
ygData.messageBody:
Well put Beld. I think we should all realize that SK's are not meant to be
healers like paladins and rangers to some extent. We are the hybrid that
focuses on dmg and killing foes. I agree though that pets have to be thought
out more about their usefulness and maybe even replaced with weak buffs or
DoT's. Heart flutter would be a great addition as it not only dmg's opponent
but also weakens its stats and those are two of the main aspects of the SK. I
also liked the idea of a dmg shield, maybe at 30. Banshee aura would fit this
perfectly as it is self cast and wouldnt be TOO powerful at only 8dmg a pop
to unbalance classes. Just my thoughts.

Gaukan Shadowmyre
TSK on Erollisi Marr
